content: समागमः {@--1@} Union, meeting, encountering, combination; अहो दैवगतिश्चित्रा तथापि न समागमः <ls>K. P. 7</ls>; <ls>R. 8. 4</ls>, <ls n="R. 8.">92</ls>, <ls n="R.">19. 16.</ls> {@--2@} Intercourse, association, society; as in सत्समागमः. {@--3@} Approach, arrival. {@--4@} Conjunction (in <ab>astr.</ab>).
